reviews.review: it's a pretty good game to play you guys should give it a shot :))
Only if you don't mind a million hackers strong and them not fixing it.  Otherwise on the rare chance you get no hackers its very fun.
I am not lying that valve is really fixing the problem
меня попросили изменить свой обзор потому что я поиграл ещё 18 часов из 17 которых у меня была просто включена кс игра говнище в дерьмище

Pretty fun game. I have played CS games since I was a kid. It is nothing like it used to be but it is still a fun game to play, but it gets boring after a while. Very fun to play with friends.

EDIT: Game is shit now since it became free. Even with prime you still run into spinbotters every other Comp match. Sad to say but I can't recommend anymore.
game is really awesome cant wait to play the new operation kinda funky with a battle pass tho

essa merda na maioria das vezes faz eu passar uma raiva com uns boludo de merda ou toxicos que da vontade de derrubar as parede da casa, hackers entt nem se fala ou tem nego girando no teu comp ou tem um imbecil de p90 do outro lado.  RECOMENDO.
its gud game becaz it gud gam
love the simple style of the game hate the cancerous playerbase
O jogo mais viciante da história.

This is a very fun fps, game chat is always lots of fun so even if you don't have friends that have this you can still have a very fun time with the people you meet in game chat the game it self is very well made and has weapons for every play style.
Кому как,но читаков здесь действительно хватает.Но в целом играбельно,если руки прямые и реакция мангуста))
Если играть, то только с праймом.

É um excelente jogo, porém apresenta um grande problema em suas atualizações, simplesmente resolvem colocar skin de bonecos, ah para né, perde todo o sentido do clássico CS. E lá vem a maior, NUNCA melhoram o anticheat, sempre vai ter usuário usando hacker na cara dura para avacalhar seu competitivo, pó chega né. O que precisa ser melhorado NUNCA vai ser mudado.
muito bom porem precisa de otimizaçao
Muy técnico y complicado, difícil de amaestrar, muy entretenido también, sobre todo para jugar con amigos, no por algo es el First Person Shooter más difícil de todos.
the game literally fucking sucks. only reason i play is cause i paid for skins and feel forced
I love CSGO. I dont play much of anything else. It is the closest thing to paintball that i can play without well...playing paintball.
Way harder than it seems and fun with friends
it is the perfect fps game. Everything about it. The game is easy to understand but the skill ceiling is so high. This is the game that will never die. Counter Strike <3
good game but lots of trolls
I hack on game easy win

very good
i like big russian guy screaming at me for being bad at the game
i think its haha funnie
jogo excelente e atemporal, uma pena que esta cada vez mais exigindo gráficos pesados
i like everything about csgo favorite game
The best FPS you can get!
played it a bit its alright
High skill gap that is worth getting into.
Jogo divertido para jogar com amigos, apesar de ter seus defeitos, da pra brincar.
playing this game boosted my SAT score by nearly 300 points
I'm a Hispanic man playing an American game learning Russian to communicate with Chinese teammates 10\10
